verbose_text: Spectra were obtained using peracetylated samples, in the presence and the absence of sodium acetate, and the main CMH from A. fumigatus was identified as 2 '-N-hydroxyoctadecenoyl-1-O-beta-D-glucopyranosyl-9-methyl-4,8-sphingadienine.
evidence: peracetylated samples, in the presence and the absence of sodium acetate
